entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 18 Aug 2023 02:01:27
entry.summary:
Tech:
- New York Times may sue OpenAI, potentially altering the AI landscape forever
- Russia's secretly trying to make its arsenal of exploding drones bigger and deadlier, leaked documents say
- Microsoft to hold ‘special event’ in New York City on September 21st
- Intel’s modernization strategy could face setback with end of $5.4B Tower deal
- Musk says X will address shadowbanning ‘soon,’ but former Trust & Safety exec explains why that will be difficult
- 4 steps founders can take today to improve team recognition tomorrow
- A bitcoin spot ETF could open the floodgates for wider crypto demand
- ProjectDiscovery raises $25M to launch a cloud version of its threat-scanning platform
- React useInView Hook - How to create useInView Hook in ReactJs

Business:
- Argentina's top presidential candidate wants to use the US dollar to crush inflation and transform the country's economy
- DeSantis debate strategy memo urges him to defend Trump whenever Chris Christie attacks the former president
- Texas AG Ken Paxton used the totally secretive name 'Dave P' to order Uber rides to his mistress
- My husband and I can't predict how much we'll earn this year, so buying a house comes down to 2 things we can control
- DeSantis advisors are urging him to 'show emotion' when talking about his family at the first GOP debate, leaked memo reveals
- There's never been a worse time to buy a house. Should you do it anyway?
- Ford aims to secure battery material supply with new Canada facility
- Netflix is sending its DVD subscribers 10 extra discs for the service’s last hurrah

AI:
- New York Times may sue OpenAI, potentially altering the AI landscape forever
- Russia's secretly trying to make its arsenal of exploding drones bigger and deadlier, leaked documents say
- Musk says X will address shadowbanning ‘soon,’ but former Trust & Safety exec explains why that will be difficult

Other:
- Thousands of student-loan borrowers celebrating Biden's latest debt relief might have to pay taxes on it in these 5 states
- Study with workers in nuclear industry suggests increased risk of cancer deaths
- Close to half of American adults favor TikTok ban, Reuters/Ipsos poll shows
- Have you seen these dehumidifiers? Stop using them or you might die
- Take a look at all the lavish properties Jeff Bezos owns across the US
- Disney Drops A Pleasant 4K Blu-Ray Surprise With Official Announcement Of ‘Prey’
- Cutting-Edge Vagal Nerve Stimulation Therapy Offers New Hope For Stoke Patients
- Scientists Uncover Thousands Of Genes Linked To Brain Size And Shape—Here's Why It Matters
- Neptune Is A Victim Of Sun’s Violent ‘Solar Maximum,’ Says New Study

Insights:
- The potential lawsuit between New York Times and OpenAI could have significant implications for the AI landscape.
- Argentina's top presidential candidate's plan to use the US dollar to combat inflation and transform the economy is a bold move.
- DeSantis' debate strategy memo highlights the importance of defending Trump and showcasing emotion when talking about family.
- The housing market is facing challenges, making it a difficult time to buy a house.
- The rise of exploding drones in Russia poses a threat to security.
- The potential tax implications for student-loan borrowers receiving debt relief in certain states could impact their financial situation.
- The preference for a TikTok ban among American adults indicates concerns over national security.
- The discovery of genes linked to brain size and shape has significant implications for understanding the human brain.
- The impact of the Sun's violent 'Solar Maximum' on Neptune sheds light on celestial dynamics.

Overall Insights:
- The tech industry is facing legal challenges and potential advancements in AI.
- Business strategies and economic transformations are being discussed in various contexts.
- The housing market and personal finance are topics of concern for many individuals.
- Developments in the entertainment industry, healthcare, and scientific research are also noteworthy.
